aboutKFU: KFU has almost 40 years of experience in teaching foreigners. Theuniversity is famous for its strong schools of mathematics, physics,biology, chemistry, linguistics. In scientific research, KFU givespriority to developments in pharmacology, biomedicine, geology,physics, chemistry, oil and gas, nano- and information technologies(IT), psychology and cultural studies, humanities, pedagogical andinterdisciplinary fields.

infoTextScdedule: Dear teacher! If there is no timetable or discrepancies are found between the displayed timetable and your actual timetable for the academic year you have determined, PLEASE CONTACT the DEAN's OFFICE of your institute or faculty to correct the identified errors.

moduleDescription: The 'Student Practices' module is designed to automate the process of assigning students to practical training and also to control the completion of student practices, i.e., for creating and submitting reports for approval.
spravochnikDescription: Directories represent a 'bank of information' that is later used to form documents. The Register of Contracts is a 'bank of contracts' between KFU and organizations where KFU students can undergo practice. Information about these organizations is later used when forming the Representation in Order (RIO), Practice Order (PO), and Appendix 4 (A4).
registerContractsDescription: The principles of working in the 'Register of Contracts': all fields must be filled out, especially attaching documents (the contract file and additional agreements) - since if a student completes a practice at an organization with which a contract has not yet been signed or renewed, the practice will not be counted. To prevent such situations, these fields have been made mandatory.
individualTasksDescription: In the 'Individual Tasks' directory, there is a list of individual tasks for a specific specialty and type of practice. These tasks will be needed to create documents in the Student Personal Account.
practicalDescription: The Practice directory contains information about a specific (taking place during a certain period) practice, as well as individual tasks and competencies acquired during the completion of this practice.
formingDocumentsDescription: The tab represents tables for creating, editing, printing documents, and sending them for approval.
formingScheduleDescription: The Practice Schedule is a document that contains general information about practices for the entire department (without the names of students and teachers). The document represents the schedule of practices for the entire department for the academic year.
representationDescription: Representation in Order is a document containing information about specific students who are assigned to N practice in M period. It is necessary to separately fill in information about the organizations and the students undergoing practice in them during the M period.
practiceOrderDescription: Practice Order is a document containing information about specific students assigned to practice during a certain period. It is a logical continuation of the 'Representation in Order' tab.
appendixDescription: Appendix 4 is a document containing information about students being sent for practical training in a specialized organization.
finalCheckDescription: Final Check is a document containing information about students who have completed their practice and are awaiting verification.

scammersNoticeText1: The Department of Digital Development of the Russian Ministry of Education and Science reports on increasing cases of fraudulent activities aimed at employees of subordinate institutions of the Russian Ministry of Education and Science, students and applicants.
scammersNoticeText2: General algorithm of actions of attackers:
scammersNoticeText3: The attacker introduces himself as an employee of a university/Ministry of Education and Science of Russia or a member of the university admissions committee and reports high chances of getting accepted into a government-funded place.
scammersNoticeText4: To enroll in a budget-funded place, the attacker invites applicants to follow a phishing link, which, in turn, leads to a malicious resource disguised as a duplicate of the State Services portal in order to steal the account and the data contained in it.
scammersNoticeText5: If you refuse to comply with these requirements, the attacker may continue to communicate in a rude manner and use threats.
scammersNoticeSteps1: Check the authenticity of information sources.
scammersNoticeSteps2: Interrupt conversations with suspicious people and block phone numbers from which suspicious incoming calls are received.
scammersNoticeSteps3: Do not tell anyone the secret code received in an SMS message from the State Services portal.
scammersNoticeSteps4: Do not open attachments, especially if they contain documents with macros, archives with passwords, and files with the extensions .rtf, .lnk, .chm, .vhd.
scammersNoticeSteps5: Do not open suspicious incoming chats in instant messengers.
scammersNoticeSteps6: If you detect suspicious behavior or if you have doubts about communicating with possible attackers posing as university employees in instant messengers or during phone calls, confirm received instructions through other communication channels.
scammersNoticeSteps7: Do not open or download attachments from emails with topics not related to the organization’s activities.
scammersNoticeSteps8: Do not transmit personal and official information through channels that have not passed official verification.
tourPracticeTeacherDescription: Convenient management of students' practices! Monitor their performance, leave feedback and evaluate their work in one section.
tourPracticesDescription: Organization of internships under control! Coordinate locations, create schedules, interact with partner companies and students.
tourToTeacherDescription: Your tool for work! Edit educational materials, manage courses, communicate with colleagues and receive up-to-date information from the administration.
tourScheduleDescription: All your classes at your fingertips! Find out the schedule of lectures, seminars and consultations in this section. No need to search for it on the website or ask the head of the class!
tourApplyDescription: Do you dream of studying with us? Find out everything about admission to the university, apply and track your status.
tourAboutUniversityDescription: Your university is more than just a place to study! Learn about its history, get to know its achievements, and stay up to date with all the latest news.
tourElectronicBookDescription: Your academic performance online! Track your grades, see your GPA and always be aware of your academic progress.
tourSessionDescription: Everything for successful passing of exams! View the session schedule, track results and clarify the curriculum.
tourAccessabilityDescription: Caring for everyone! Enable the version for the visually impaired to adapt the interface for comfortable work with your personal account.
tourMessengerDescription: Now you don't need to search for contacts! Communicate with university staff and students directly in your personal account using a convenient built-in messenger.
tourAboutMeDescription: Your personal information in one place! Check your data, contacts and other important information. If something has changed – update it right here.
tourBackToOldELKDescription: Something doesn't work? Go back to your old, familiar personal account with one click.
